title: ‘The Last 500 Meters Were Pretty Crazy’: Best Vuelta a España Showing Yet for Sepp Kuss as Form Appears to Be on the Up
content:
American rider moves up three places in the overall standings following strong Vuelta display on Sunday: 'The Vuelta's been super hard.'

Read the full article at ‘The Last 500 Meters Were Pretty Crazy’: Best Vuelta a España Showing Yet for Sepp Kuss as Form Appears to Be on the Up on Velo.
author: sstokes
